alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Cheshire; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton; Strafford; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 10:01AM EST until February 26 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SNOWSTORM TO IMPACT THE REGION TODAY... .Low pressure will track out of the Ohio Valley this early morning and cross southern New England today bringing periods of moderate to heavy snowfall across portions of New Hampshire and southwestern Maine. The heaviest snowfall is expected to fall from Friday morning through the early evening hours. Significant travel impacts are expected. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and western Maine. Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The potential exists for snowbands that will bring periods of locally heavy snowfall, which will lead to rapid snow accumulations and extremely dangerous travel conditions. Travel could be very difficult due to low visibility and snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
